```{r, results='hide'}
# library(tidyverse)
nflLatLong <- read.csv("NFLData.csv")
```


```{r}
library(leaflet)
teamIcons <- icons(
  iconUrl = nflLatLong$Logos,
  iconWidth = 40*215/230, iconHeight = 31, iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2,
  iconAnchorY = 16
)
```

## NFL Stadiums

```{r}
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(data = nflLatLong,
             lng = ~longitude,
             lat = ~latitude,
             icon = teamIcons, 
             label = ~Team,
             popup = ~paste("<br>Conference:", Conference,
                            "<br>State:", State,
                            "<br>Number of SBs:", SBs)
             )
```
